name: Mrs and Mrs home decoration/wall hanging
description:
A special and unique gift for the married couple.

This is a custom made design and so can be sewn onto bunting, a cushion or pillow case, a bag or blanket.

Letters are cut out of complimentary fabrics and sewn to background using applique.

Just contact me with your idea and I will make it happen.

name: A tee to bring out the animal in you! here is the evil giraffe...
description:
The Evil giraffe has a habbit of eating all the leaves in all of the trees. 

Perhaps you can coax him to share?

You can order him on any tshirt colour you like (as long as I can get hold of one in that colour!) and ink in:
 white, black, yellow, green, blue and pink! 
I screen print him on and he is heat fixed to be washed below 60.

In the notes section after purchase just let me know...
Tshirt size and colour
Ink colour
Size and fit


Lovingly hand screen printed by HB

name: Red Star and Hex Cushions
description:
A pair of patchwork and applique cushions handmade by hayleybeth in her home studio.

Both cushions are made from unused luxurious sample fabric and really do bring a rustic atmoshphere to any room.


All cushions come with padding and a removable and washable cover.

Other colour patterns available, see other listings.

name: Poodle shine top
description:
'I'm the crossed stitch poodle And I want to come along on all your adventures with you...pic nics, bike rides and what have you. Think of me as your pocket pet, I just don't have a pocket yet.'

The top has a side and back zip so is a tight fit that is easy to get off.

In the corner is a little cross stitched poodle to keep you company on your summer time adventures.

This is a one off size 8/10

name: Beautiful bunting
description:
From the 'Brighten up the everyday' range 

Here is some homemade bunting to help you celebrate birthday, Christening, wedding, hen party or to simply decorate your favourite little ones room.

Each flag is made from off cuts of beautiful patterned fabric which is then arranged to compliment and contrast using applique to sew letters to each flag.. 

If you would like a specific colour please email me or let me know in the paypal comments section along with the name/message required.

The price below is for up to 6 letters, any more are Â£2 per flag and can be added on by purchasing the number of individual flags required.
